About

A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. It has an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to write.

Where we use it

Our Chat and File server are both wrote in Ruby.

Why we use it

Writing event based code like what is required to maintain a high responsiveness from our chat server needs to be as simple as possible and todays tools make that very easy for us

External Links

https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/
